com.spotify.sdk.android.player

Interface Player

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    SpotifyPlayer

    public interface Player
    Any native player that connects to Spotify playback services must implement this interface. It can also be used to mock native player for test purposes.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      static interface  Player.AudioDeliveredCallback
      Interface used to register callback for audio data received from native player.
      static interface  Player.AudioFlushCallback
      Interface used to register callback for audio flush command received from native player.
      static interface  Player.NotificationCallback 
      static interface  Player.OperationCallback

    • Method Detail

      • addNotificationCallback

        boolean addNotificationCallback(Player.NotificationCallback callback)

      • removeNotificationCallback

        boolean removeNotificationCallback(Player.NotificationCallback callback)

      • initialize

        void initialize(Config config)
        Initializes the native player.
        Parameters:
        config - The configuration object to init native player with.

      • destroy

        void destroy()
        Destroys the native player.

      • login

        boolean login(String oauthToken)
        Logs in to the native player.
        Parameters:
        oauthToken - The token to log in with. Note: not all login errors have to be immediate. For details refer to specific implementation.

      • logout

        boolean logout()
        Log out from the native player.

      • addConnectionStateCallback

        boolean addConnectionStateCallback(ConnectionStateCallback callback)

      • removeConnectionStateCallback

        boolean removeConnectionStateCallback(ConnectionStateCallback callback)

      • playUri

        void playUri(Player.OperationCallback callback,
             String uri,
             int index,
             int positionInMs)
        Plays a single uri from specified index and specified position. Which uris are supported depends on a specific implementation of the native player.
        Parameters:
        callback - operation result callback
        uri - Uri to play with the player.
        index - A zero-based index from which to play.
        positionInMs - A position to start playback from. Note: not all playback errors have to be immediate. For details refer to specific implementation.

      • queue

        void queue(Player.OperationCallback callback,
           String trackUri)
        Queue the track. When track is queued it will be played directly after the one that is currently playing.
        Parameters:
        callback - operation result callback
        trackUri - The uri of the track to queue.

      • pause

        void pause(Player.OperationCallback callback)
        Pauses currently playing track.
        Parameters:
        callback - operation result callback

      • resume

        void resume(Player.OperationCallback callback)
        Resumes currently playing track.
        Parameters:
        callback - operation result callback

      • skipToNext

        void skipToNext(Player.OperationCallback callback)
        Skips to next track.
        Parameters:
        callback - operation result callback

      • skipToPrevious

        void skipToPrevious(Player.OperationCallback callback)
        Skips to previous track.
        Parameters:
        callback - operation result callback

      • seekToPosition

        void seekToPosition(Player.OperationCallback callback,
                    int positionInMs)
        Skips currently playing song to defined position.
        Parameters:
        callback - operation result callback
        positionInMs - Position to skip to.

      • setShuffle

        void setShuffle(Player.OperationCallback callback,
                boolean enabled)
        Turns shuffling on and off.
        Parameters:
        callback - operation result callback
        enabled - if true shuffle will be turned on, off otherwise.

      • setRepeat

        void setRepeat(Player.OperationCallback callback,
               boolean enabled)
        Turns repeating on and off.
        Parameters:
        callback - operation result callback
        enabled - if true repeat will be turned on, off otherwise.

      • setPlaybackBitrate

        void setPlaybackBitrate(Player.OperationCallback callback,
                        PlaybackBitrate playbackBitrate)
        Set the bitrate of the player to specified value.
        Parameters:
        callback - operation result callback
        playbackBitrate - The bitrate to set playback to. By default is is set to PlaybackBitrate.BITRATE_NORMAL
        See Also:
        for details

      • setConnectivityStatus

        void setConnectivityStatus(Player.OperationCallback callback,
                           Connectivity status)
        Sends the information about current connectivity to native player.
        Parameters:
        callback - operation result callback
        status - Must be one of Connectivity properties.

      • refreshCache

        void refreshCache()
        Triggers cache refresh and possible eviction of state data.

      • getMetadata

        Metadata getMetadata()

      • getPlaybackState

        PlaybackState getPlaybackState()
